args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: https://www.foxnews.com/media/biden-harris-department-energy-official-calls-queering-nuclear-weapons-part-radical-dei-agenda
https://links.truthsocial.com/link/112999467653737497
Biden-Harris Department of Energy official calls for 'queering nuclear weapons' as part of radical DEI agenda
A recent DOE hire, Sneha Nair, advocates for nuclear disarmament and "queering nuclear weapons" as part of DEI efforts she views as crucial to bolstering U.S. national security.
